item.description: Join the BSA Emerging Professionals Network on September 28 at 6:00 pm on the next stop in its firm tour series: the offices of Steffian Bradley Architects. Established in 1932, this award-winning, Boston-based international firm specializes in architecture, interiors, planning, lighting and urban design. There is limited space so RSVP by September 24 to rsvp@architects.org with "EPNet 9/28" in the subject line.
item.name: Tour Steffian Bradley!
